title: New Trailers for The Flash and Arrow Reveal Zoom's Plan and Prove Two Canaries Are Better Than One
text: 14th annual chili cook-off draws hundreds ... New Trailers for The Flash and Arrow Reveal Zoom's Plan and Prove Two Canaries Are Better Than One I love the smell of Comic-Con in the afternoon! It's full of fake blood, real sweat, and happy tears, but it's totally all worth it for what I'm about to show you.Fans who attended Warner Bros. programming block on Sunday were treated to two new trailers for The CW's most super of superhero shows. And now thanks ... Comment Posted Oct. 11, 2015 at 5:10 PM Updated at 7:56 PM Posted Oct. 11, 2015 at 5:10 PM Updated at 7:56 PM Â» Social News I love the smell of Comic-Con in the afternoon! It's full of fake blood, real sweat, and happy tears, but it's totally all worth it for what I'm about to show you. Fans who attended Warner Bros. programming block on Sunday were treated to two new trailers for The CW's most super of superhero shows. And now thanks to the magic of the internet, you can see them too! Fall TV Popularity Contest: Which new shows won you over? Vote now! In the new trailer previewing Season 2 of The Flash , fans get a longer look at Teddy Sears ' Jay Garrick and discover more of Zoom's dastardly plan. Meanwhile, the new trailer for Arrow shows a Black Canary team-up and digs into Thea's Lazarus Pit-sized issues. What do you think? Which trailer has you the most excited?
